param.name: new_period
param.label: Length of time to mark entries as 'New'
param.description: Textual description, like '2 months' or '1 day'. Leave blank to disable.

param.name: max_front_page
param.label: Maximum entries to show on the front page

param.name: min_front_page
param.label: Minimum entries to show on the front page
param.description: For example, with a minimum set to 15, if only 10 items qualify as current according to their timestamp, the 5 most-recently archived items will be shown to fill out the list
